author: ceki
msg: In reaction to bug report 9435, changed the log4j.dtd
so that log4j:event is now made of logger and level
attributes instead of category and priority.
Changed XMLLayout to conform to the DTD.
Log4j 1.2.4 will be released when chainsaw code follows

author: oburn
msg: Fixed the bug in the code that loads events from an XML file. The code now
correctly handles multiple calls to characters(). Tested with Crimson and

author: oburn
msg: Fixed how the Checkstyle JAR file is found to match the new build system.
Also updated the target to run chainsaw to include crimson.
